display.title: This Rocks!
description: Whilst frolicking about on the surface, you may have spotted a couple of &&dSurface rocks&&r.

These little guys indicate the type of veins that are below them. Just right-click &&7(or mine!)&&r the surface rock to receive a corresponding pile of &&aTiny Dust&&r. This will also add the vein to your minimap.

You can now use &&2EMI&&r to learn more about the vein beneath your feet. Just press &&dU&&r on the Tiny Dust you mined from the rock, find the corresponding Raw Ore, and press &&dR&&r. From there, navigate to the &&6Ore Vein Diagram&&r. This page contains details on what &&btypes of ores&&r generate with it, their &&3generation patterns&&r, their &&espawning dimension&&r and &&dY-level range&&r, and their &&aspawning weight&&r, which is the chance it spawns.
